verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ <S%H1732><s%> [A Psalm] of David אוֹדְךָ֥ <S%H3034><s%> I will praise בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לִבִּ֑י <S%H3820><s%> thee with my whole heart נֶ֖גֶד <S%H5048><s%> before אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> before the gods אֲזַמְּרֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H2167><s%> will I sing praise

אֶשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֨ה <S%H7812><s%> I will worship אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward הֵיכַ֪ל <S%H1964><s%> temple קָדְשְׁךָ֡ <S%H6944><s%> toward thy holy וְא֘וֹדֶ֤ה <S%H3034><s%> and praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמֶ֗ךָ <S%H8034><s%> thy name עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according חַסְדְּךָ֥ <S%H2617><s%> for thy lovingkindness וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according אֲמִתֶּ֑ךָ <S%H571><s%> and for thy truth כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִגְדַּ֥לְתָּ <S%H1431><s%> for thou hast magnified עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ <S%H8034><s%> above all thy name אִמְרָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H565><s%> thy word

בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In the day קָ֭רָֽאתִי <S%H7121><s%> when I cried וַֽתַּעֲנֵ֑נִי <S%H6030><s%> thou answeredst תַּרְהִבֵ֖נִי <S%H7292><s%> me [and] strengthenedst בְנַפְשִׁ֣י <S%H5315><s%> in my soul עֹֽז׃ <S%H5797><s%> me [with] strength

יוֹד֣וּךָ <S%H3034><s%> shall praise יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> thee O LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All מַלְכֵי־ <S%H4428><s%> All the kings אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> When שָׁ֝מְע֗וּ <S%H8085><s%> when they hear אִמְרֵי־ <S%H561><s%> the words פִֽיךָ׃ <S%H6310><s%> of thy mouth

וְ֭יָשִׁירוּ <S%H7891><s%> Yea they shall sing בְּדַרְכֵ֣י <S%H1870><s%> in the ways יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> For גָ֝ד֗וֹל <S%H1419><s%> for great כְּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> [is] the glory יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> though רָ֣ם <S%H7311><s%> [be] high יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Though the LORD וְשָׁפָ֣ל <S%H8217><s%> unto the lowly יִרְאֶ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> yet hath he respect וְ֝גָבֹ֗הַּ <S%H1364><s%> but the proud מִמֶּרְחָ֥ק <S%H4801><s%> afar off יְיֵדָֽע׃ <S%H3045><s%> he knoweth

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Though אֵלֵ֤ךְ ׀ <S%H1980><s%> walk בְּקֶ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> in the midst צָרָ֗ה <S%H6869><s%> of trouble תְּחַ֫יֵּ֥נִי <S%H2421><s%> thou wilt revive עַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> against אַ֣ף <S%H639><s%> against the wrath אֹ֭יְבַי <S%H341><s%> of mine enemies תִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> me thou shalt stretch forth יָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand וְת֖וֹשִׁיעֵ֣נִי <S%H3467><s%> shall save יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3225><s%> and thy right hand

יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD יִגְמֹ֪ר <S%H1584><s%> will perfect בַּ֫עֲדִ֥י <S%H1157><s%> what יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD חַסְדְּךָ֣ <S%H2617><s%> [that which] concerneth me thy mercy לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever מַעֲשֵׂ֖י <S%H4639><s%> not the works יָדֶ֣יךָ <S%H3027><s%> of thine own hands אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֶּֽרֶף׃ <S%H7503><s%> forsake
